sources.name: searchLog
sources.script:
source(output(
		{_col0_} as integer,
		{_col1_} as string,
		{_col2_} as string,
		{_col3_} as string,
		{_col4_} as integer,
		{_col5_} as string,
		{_col6_} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> searchLog

transformations.name: RenameColumns
transformations.script:
searchLog select(mapColumn(
		userid = {_col0_},
		start = {_col1_},
		region = {_col2_},
		query = {_col3_},
		duration = {_col4_},
		urls = {_col5_},
		clickedurls = {_col6_}
	))~> RenameColumns
